name: Withering
description: Withering is a startup project that serves as our final deliverable for our Videogame Design and Production classes.  Our team is comprised of Juan "Arkhanz" Hernandez and Marco "Wada" Campos.  We are software engineering students at CETYS Universidad in Ensenada, Baja California, México.  We will be adding more updates as time goes by, to be able to deliver the desired final product.
